attributes.action: remove himself from the human gene pool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As our PM has failed in every aspect of his government, from record debt, passing the buck, destroying jobs, overstaffing the public sector, removal of our liberties, a vote on Europe etc etc.

Should not the PM commit suicide at the first available opportunity and do us and the World, especially America(which he blamed for the credit crunch until he got there then bottled it) a favour.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
